title: Hacked account, Need help from a Rioter
body:
Yesterday my account Pink Vibrator was hacked and transferred to NA servers yesterday, whilst I was logged in as well. I don't know how or what happened, but they even changed my password and email address. I've sent a support ticket to riot, but I was told by a friend to post on the boards so that a Rioter may see it too.

I can answer any further questions upon request, I just want this dealt with, Im pretty annoyed someone was able to get a hold of my account without me ever giving out my password.

replies.body:
As well as the ticket, I'd do all the scans you can on your pc to make sure there's no keyloggers or other malware that could of taken that info.
Also clear your browser history, including log ins and cookies (incase of a scam site).
EDIT: Thanks, wasn't trying to be mean, just to convey urgency.

Thanks. By posting that info on the boards anyone could send that to support claiming your account was theirs, hence the need to remove it quickly.

Going through support is still your best bet for account recovery, they may take a few days to get back to you though, depending on how busy they are. Sorry this happened to you, and please be patient, support will resolve this ASAP :)
I understand. Its just infuriating to see my account being used and being unable to do anything about it.
I know what you mean, don't worry about it. It happens unfortunately, but the support team will help you as quickly as they can :)

Hey there,

Please remove the account recovery information from your post ASAP, this can be used by anyone with malicious intent to compromise your account again.

The ticket you submitted is enough, just wait for a reply there for now. The Player Support team will assist you as soon as they can.
